name: Tile Map Accelerator Web Demo ( Auto Chunking )
name_original: Tile Map Accelerator Web Demo ( Auto Chunking )
description:
Tile Map Accelerator Demo. 

Controls

W A S D : Move Camera ( When not focused on player obj )

- AND = : Zoom Camera
Left Click : Select tile ( Places Active Edit Tile in Edit Mode )
F : Toggle Player Focus / Camera Lock
Arrow Keys : Move Player Object
E : Enter Edit Mode

While in Edit Mode :

1 : Select Grass01 Tile as Brush
2 : Select Tree01 Tile as Brush
3 : Select Tree02 Tile as Brush
0 : Select Water Tile as Brush
ENTER : Bake active changes to GPU map
